verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses בְמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> ve-mid-bar- in the wilderness סִ֠ינַי <S%H5514><s%> Si-nai of Sinai בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֜ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit of the second לְצֵאתָ֨ם <S%H3318><s%> le-tze-Tam after they were come out מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon in the first לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

וְיַעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-ya-'a-Su also keep בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- Let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pa-sach the passover בְּמוֹעֲדֽוֹ׃ <S%H4150><s%> be-mo-'a-Do. at his appointed season

בְּאַרְבָּעָ֣ה <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָֽׂר־ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-sar- teen י֠וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh of this month הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh of this בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> bein at הָֽעֲרְבַּ֛יִם <S%H6153><s%> ha-'ar-Ba-yim at even תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּמוֹעֲד֑וֹ <S%H4150><s%> be-mo-'a-Do; it in his appointed season כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all חֻקֹּתָ֥יו <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tav according to all the rites וּכְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-che-chol- to all מִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tav of it and according to all the ceremonies תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su thereof shall ye keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that they should keep הַפָּֽסַח׃ <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pa-sach. the passover

וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su And they kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפֶּ֡סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach the passover בָּרִאשׁ֡וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-Shon of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <S%H6153><s%> ha-'ar-Ba-yim at even בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai; of Sinai כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Ke-chol to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh according to all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su so did בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi were certain אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim, And there were certain men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become טְמֵאִים֙ <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Im who were defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> le-Ne-fesh by the dead body אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of a man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יָכְל֥וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu that they could לַעֲשֹׂת־ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sot- not keep הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach the passover בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom on that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; they וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-re-Vu and they came לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei and before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom on that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. he

וַ֠יֹּאמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-me-ru said הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem-mah And those אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we טְמֵאִ֖ים <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Im unto him We [are] defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> le-Ne-fesh by the dead body אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam; of a man לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah why נִגָּרַ֗ע <S%H1639><s%> nig-ga-Ra', wherefore are we kept back לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti because הַקְרִ֜ב <S%H7126><s%> hak-Riv that we may not offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קָרְבַּ֤ן <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-Ban an offering יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <S%H4150><s%> be-Mo-'a-Do, in his appointed season בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; And Moses עִמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> 'im-Du unto them Stand still וְאֶשְׁמְעָ֔ה <S%H8085><s%> ve-'esh-me-'Ah, and I will hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- to what יְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> ye-tzav-Veh will command יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh what the LORD לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If any אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִהְיֶֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- becomes טָמֵ֣א׀ <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me shall be unclean לָנֶ֡פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> la-Ne-fesh by reason of a dead body אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> o or בְדֶ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ve-De-rech or [be] in a journey רְחֹקָ֜הׅ <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kah afar off לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, of you or of your posterity וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah yet he shall keep פֶ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> Fe-sach the passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni of the second בְּאַרְבָּעָ֨ה <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <S%H6153><s%> ha-'ar-Ba-yim at even יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su they shall keep אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with מַצּ֥וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot it with unleavened bread וּמְרֹרִ֖ים <S%H4844><s%> u-me-ro-Rim and bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu-hu. it [and] eat

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- none יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> yash-'I-ru They shall leave מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu of it עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker, none of it unto the morning וְעֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> ve-'E-tzem any bone לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִשְׁבְּרוּ־ <S%H7665><s%> yish-be-ru- nor break ב֑וֹ vo; כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kat of it according to all the ordinances הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach of the passover יַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su they shall keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וְהָאִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish But the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who ה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he טָה֜וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor that [is] clean וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> u-ve-De-rech and is not in a journey לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah, become וְחָדַל֙ <S%H2308><s%> ve-cha-Dal and forbeareth לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to keep הַפֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach, the passover וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh even the same soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he מֵֽעַמֶּ֑יהָ <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mei-ha; from among his people כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for קָרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-Ban not the offering יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not הִקְרִיב֙ <S%H7126><s%> hik-Riv because he brought בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <S%H4150><s%> be-Mo-'a-Do, in his appointed season חֶטְא֥וֹ <S%H2399><s%> chet-'O his sin יִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa shall bear הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish that man הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. he

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יָג֨וּר <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gur shall sojourn אִתְּכֶ֜ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem among גֵּ֗ר <S%H1616><s%> Ger, And if a stranger וְעָ֤שָֽׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah among you and will keep פֶ֙סַח֙ <S%H6453><s%> fe-sach the passover לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD כְּחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> ke-chuk-Kat according to the ordinance הַפֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach of the passover וּכְמִשְׁפָּט֖וֹ <S%H4941><s%> u-che-mish-pa-To and according to the manner כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh; thereof so shall he do חֻקָּ֤ה <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kah ordinance אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger both for the stranger וּלְאֶזְרַ֥ח <S%H249><s%> u-le-'ez-Rach and for him that was born הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. in the land פ Peh

וּבְיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-yOm And on the day הָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kim was reared up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan, that the tabernacle כִּסָּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> kis-Sah covered הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan the cloud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan, the tabernacle לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> le-'O-hel [namely] the tent הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony וּבָעֶ֜רֶב <S%H6153><s%> u-va-'E-rev and at even יִהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan there was upon the tabernacle כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'eh- as it were the appearance אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker. until the morning
